title: Fushigi no Kuni de Alice to: Dive in Wonderland

alternative_titles.ja: 不思議の国でアリスと -Dive in Wonderland-

synopsis:
Rise Azumino is a university student who has lost in her life. One day, guided by an invitation letter left behind by her late grandmother, she enters "Wonderland." She meets a girl named Alice there and they travel together.

White Rabbit, Caterpillar, Queen of Hearts, Card Soldiers, Mad Hatter, March Hare, Humpty Dumpty, Tweedle Dum and Tweedle Dee who are twins, Cheshire Cat and... The residents of Wonderland appear before Rise one after another! And the crazy commotion that ensues!

What kind of future will Rise choose in this crazy adventure with Alice?

(Source: Official website, translated)
